introduction.title: 2023 NYCU TICA CUPï¼Real Escape Game
introduction.content:
Welcome to National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University! 
ã€€
As outstanding award recipients of ICDF scholarship, we believe that you possess both exceptional intellectual and physical capabilities. In the following activities, we aim to provide you with the opportunity to experience the beauty of the mountains and forests right within the city, allowing you to explore and discover the unique culture of National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University without the need for traveling far into the mountain. Letâ€™s start!
 
é–‹å§‹â¡ï¸Start

prompts.title: Rules of Real Escape Game
prompts.alt:
Timeï¼š13:00 PM to 14:30 PM 
Venusï¼šYang Ming Campus 
 
Rulesï¼š
Each team is led by a captain who uses a mobile phone to scan QR codes or answer questions to collect points. The team with the highest score wins, with prizes awarded to the top three teams.
 
ä¸‹ä¸€é—œâ¡ï¸Next

prompts.title: Instruction
prompts.alt:
1.Swipe up, down, left, or right to access more content for this level.
2.The 'Enter Answer' button below: View level question, verify answers. 
3.The lightbulb button on the bottom right: Allows you to receive hints.
4.The top right menu bar: Allows access to level list, game status, and customer support

prompts.title: Level select explanation
prompts.alt:
Level Cleared - Level image is in a clear state.
Unlocked - Level image is in a blurred state
Locked - Level image has a padlock icon

There are a total of 'four major regions with 25 areas,'' and you can complete them 'in any order.'' You can refer to the game map for the locations of the four major regions, and plan your own route accordingly.

levels.title: You are the expert of NYCU!!!!

prompts.title: You are the expert of NYCU!!!!
prompts.alt: Congratulations! You have fully grasped the history and the unique mountain and forest characteristics of National Yang-Ming Chiao Tung University! You are truly the chosen one, an elite among elites!
